fullName: As a registered user, I would like to have a dedicated dashboard page on the site to control my actions and settings on the site.: [US_017][TC_005] Make the body section visible on the Dashboard Page

name: [US_017][TC_005] Make the body section visible on the Dashboard Page

steps.name: Given  the user opens the browser and goes to the url from the data.
When  the user selects the Login option from the home page.
Then  The user enters their email and password correctly, then presses the Sign In button.
Then  The 'body' section on the Dashboard page (e.g., panels such as Purchase History, Wishlist, Cart) should be visible."
And  The user logs out by clicking the "logoutButton"
